docs.title: Yifei HUANG
docs.text:
huangyifei00@shu.edu.cn

Shanghai University

Shanghai, China

I am easy-going and optimistic, with a strong sense of responsibility and good team-spirit. I completed most of courses in the specialized field, obtaining good grades and a solid professional foundation. I have a strong interest in research. I have done a lot of social services and have good interpersonal communication skills.

docs.title: Education
docs.text:
Undergraduate of Inorganic Non-metallic Materials Engineering

2020.09 - now, School of Materials Science and Engineering, Shanghai University, China

GPA (3.67 / 4.0)

CET4 (603), CET6 (525)

docs.title: Experience
docs.text:
• In-depth research on C12A7, 2023.02 - now The project leader of the study on the preparation and electrical transport of seven-aluminum-dodecalcium ceramics, and has obtained certain experimental results.
  • Trainee, CryLink Company, 2023.06 - now Write articles about materials. Publish articles on the company's website. Integrate company exhibition information and assist the company in finding potential customers.

docs.title: Honors
docs.text:
• The Second Class Scholarship for Academic Excellence of Shanghai University, 2020 - 2021
  • The Third Prize of "Jinghe" Scholarship of School of Materials Science and Engineering of Shanghai University, 2021-2022
  • The Third Prize of "Zhongtian Sailing Scholarship", 2021
  • The Second Prize of "Academic Excellence Scholarship of Shanghai University", 2021-2022

docs.title: Skills
docs.text: Fluent English in writing and speaking and pass the CET-6(525).
